text: Branko "Đuro" Mamula (; 30 May 1921 – 19 October 2021) was a politician and Yugoslav officer. He was later the Minister of Defence of Yugoslavia from 1982 to 1988. Mamula turned 100 in May 2021 and died in Tivat, Montenegro on 19 October 2021 from COVID-19. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Montenegrin people Category:Yugoslavian politicians Category:Yugoslavian military people Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic Category:Centenarians
title: Branko Mamula
